description: A classic, attractively elegant restaurant which boasts an extensive choice of dishes on its menu. The varied options here range from meat to fish dishes, often prepared in regional recipes such as tagliatelle with duck ragù and toasted hazelnuts, chicken liver risotto, Vicenza-style baccalà and meat casserole.
